participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Reflective and somewhat disillusioned, grappling with the consequences of his actions.
participant_1.background: i will be released in about a month. i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, with a love for adventure and creativity.
participant_2.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i am in the third grade.

content.text: Hiya! I am a student at the moment.
